inclusion.criterion: acute DeBakkey I aortic dissection is confirmed by CTA
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: the patient or family members can understand the research plan and will participate in this study and provide a written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Dissection involved the superior mesenteric artery, renal artery and coronary artery,
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: there is a serious complication of nervous system, such as coma, paraplegia, etc
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He also has a systolic murmur in the neck.
